header.name: The House of Sun and Snow
header.author: System Converter
header.description: Converted one-page dungeon by Cameron Badnell. Layout approximated for graph testing.

rooms.name: 1. Atrium
rooms.description: Small camp with a journal about a magic journey. Crystal Stone in left eye triggers electric bolt if removed. Mold Men lurk on the walls.

rooms.name: 2. Lake Room
rooms.description: Humid, muddy floor, large lake center. Stone Fish statue spits water. Giant Toad swims. In Winter: lake frozen, Giant Frog sleeping, Icicle sword under ice.

rooms.name: 3. Garden
rooms.description: Decorated room with bushes. Salnia the dryad helps if shown kindness. In Winter: bleak except NW corner, Frostlily plant blooms.

rooms.name: 4. Wheel Room
rooms.description: Dozens of rocks in dark room, wheel to change seasons. Large wheel with summer/winter sky on axis. Works only with closed door. Sapphire gem adds summer constellation; rocks shift to depict winter sky.

rooms.name: 5. Forest
rooms.description: Tall trees, mold signs. Ants patrol, Giant Bird hunts. Jeweled egg in largest nest. In Winter: cold breeze, trees lose leaves.

rooms.name: 6. Hills
rooms.description: Large hills surround room. Stone hand from East wall. Plaque reads 'Seed's womb, Man's tomb, Rock's doom'. Birds peck skeleton in Winter; Snow blankets hills, Snow Golems wander.

rooms.name: 7. Tomb
rooms.description: Large sarcophagus dedicated to Costric the First. Skeleton and Mossy Ring inside. In Summer: black flowers bloom. In Winter: snowfall in room.

rooms.name: 8. Blackwood Tree
rooms.description: Doors locked, covered in vines. Drzazarek the Hobgoblin poisons Blackwood, casts spells. Summer Horn here. Mold Men guard Drzazarek chanting spell. In Winter: vines weaker.

game_elements.name: Icicle
game_elements.description: Shortsword +1, icy blade, can freeze liquid over time.

game_elements.name: Summer Horn
game_elements.description: Wooden horn, summons daylight for 20 ft radius for 10 minutes.

game_elements.name: Mossy Ring
game_elements.description: Ring causes moss to grow on wearer, respected by druids/rangers/dryads.

game_elements.name: Crystal Stone
game_elements.description: Crystal with electric bolt trap if removed.

game_elements.name: Sapphire Gem
game_elements.description: Adds constellation to summer sky in Wheel Room.

game_elements.name: Jeweled Egg
game_elements.description: Hidden in largest nest in Forest.
